title: [Bug]: Teams takes a long time to load
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

When I start Teams, it takes almost a minute to load. Before, it used to start right away. I tried reinstalling, but it didnâ€™t help.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Start portal for teams.
2.Fans are spinning.
3.Nothing happens.
4.After a minutes or so the program starts.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.Start portal for teams.
2.Window comes up immediately.
3.Login.
4.Use the program.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
